title: 92/119/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 February 1992 extending for Germany the period during which seed of a variety of perennial ryegrass may be subject to marketing restrictions (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 3 February 1992  extending for Germany the period during which seed of a variety of perennial ryegrass may be subject to marketing restrictions  (Only the German text is authentic)  (92/119/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The period provided for in Article 15 (1) of Directive 70/457/EEC is, where Germany is concerned, extended from 31 December 1991 to 31 March 1992 in respect of the variety Lieselotte (Lolium perenne L.).
Germany shall notify the Commission and the other Member States of the date from which it makes use of the authorization pursuant to Article 1 and the detailed methods to be followed.
This Decision is addressed to the German Federal Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 225, 12. 10. 1970, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 48.
